tours.title: Jet Ski Tour
tours.description: Experience an exhilarating Jet Ski adventure in the beautiful waters of Dubai!
tours.description2: Enjoy an exciting Jet Ski adventure in Dubai's beautiful waters! This thrilling experience includes a 35-minute Jet Ski ride with sea activities, all under the guidance of well-trained and certified staff. The package includes convenient pick-up and drop-off from your hotel or residence in Dubai via AC Land Cruiser, refreshments, and the option to arrange pick-up times according to your preference.

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel or Residence in Dubai
inclusions.transport: Pick by AC Land Cruiser / Vehicle
inclusions.activity: 35 Minutes Drive Jet Ski (include Sea Activities)
inclusions.staff: Well Trained & Certified Staff to guide you
inclusions.location: Jet Ski Point at Mamzae Beach Dubai
inclusions.dropoff: Drop off your Hotel or Residence in Dubai
inclusions.flexible: Other Pick Time can be arrange on your desire time

tours.title: Luxury Yacht Cruising
tours.description: Experience the ultimate luxury with a private yacht cruise in Dubai Marina!
tours.description2: Indulge in a luxurious yacht cruising experience in Dubai Marina. Enjoy a 2-hour cruise in the marina lagoon with professional crew, including a skipper, fishing equipment, safety jackets, and light refreshments. The duration can be extended at extra charges for those who wish to extend their luxury experience.

inclusions.crew: Professional crew with the services of skipper
inclusions.extension: Hours can be extended at extra charges
